org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.transformers

Class BaggingUpstreamTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.transformers.BaggingUpstreamTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, UpstreamTransformer

    public class BaggingUpstreamTransformer
extends Object
implements UpstreamTransformer
    This class encapsulates the logic needed to do bagging (bootstrap aggregating) by features. The action of this class on a given upstream is to replicate each entry in accordance to Poisson distribution.
    See Also:

      • BaggingUpstreamTransformer

        public BaggingUpstreamTransformer(long seed,
                                  double subsampleRatio)
        Construct instance of this transformer with a given subsample ratio.
        Parameters:
        seed - Seed used for generating poisson distribution which in turn used to make subsamples.
